definitions.example: Are you a member of the American Athletic Association?
Since you're such an athletic person, you may wish to consider joining.

definitions.definition: Having a muscular, well developed body, being in shape.
definitions.example: You have such an athletic build—you must work out regularly.

definitions.definition: An attribute of a motion or play which requires fine physical ability.
definitions.example: The center fielder made an athletic play to snatch the ball from over the fence.
